name: ExtremePong
description:
Extreme Pong is a regular game of pong, were you must compete against a bot to 5 points. If you are unfortunate enough to lose, you're pc will bluescreen as it is the only acceptable punishment.

First to 5 points wins.

You cannot close the game, once you start it, you must commit to it.

Discord: DerpyHub

PunishmentRewardBluescreenNo Bluescreen

Versions:

ExtremePongExtremePong+PossibleNot Possible

Controls

Move Up
Move Down
- Up Arrow
- Down Arrow
